Text:
Alpha/Omega Flight -- the Canadian superheroes get screwed every time they guest-star in Avengers!  :-P

thanks GIANNIS511

Damn, the Canadian in me was excited for their appearance, they didn't have to get screwed. :( I hope your kidding STFmaryville.

Anyways thanks GIANNIS511.
S-C-R-E-W-E-D in all caps. Poor Wendigo. Or Sasquatch. Whoever... ouch. Note to future Alpha Flight teams: do not show up for your Avengers crossover!

That is what happens when you exist solely to maintain a copyright. Look at what happened a couple years ago. They staged a storyline (Chaos War) with a resurrection subplot because there was an editorial decision that it was easier to have people rise from the dead than create new characters going under the same names.
This is a unique issue to download if you want to see Regina, Saskatchewan get literally destroyed as part of the storyline. It even caught the attention of CBC news in Canada.
